page.title: 11Dennis's Day Part 2
page.content: When Neil comes out we play Bunging with his ball. First of all we make teams then 1 team goes down one end of the playground and the other goes down the other end. Then we keep throwing the ball to and fro and try and score, but if someone catches your throw you are out and you cannot throw again until the next game. At 10.50 it is time to go in and we do English, Maths or Religious Education until lunch time. We can have sandwiches or school dinner. After dinner we have another playtime until 1.15 when we go in, then the first one to sit down is worst, the second is best, the third is the one with the hairy chest and the last the dirty donkey. If we go swimming we get changed in the Boys' Toilets. We have a story last thing then I get the bus home.
